trans-unit.source: It is possible to print each page of a document using different page settings.
trans-unit.target: Существует возможность печати на каждой странице документа, используя разные параметры.

trans-unit.source: You set page settings by modifying individual properties of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs.PageSettings%2A> property or by setting the property to a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>.
trans-unit.target: Параметры страницы устанавливаются путем замены индивидуальных свойств <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs.PageSettings%2A>свойства или путем присвоения свойству <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs.PageSettings%2A>

trans-unit.source: The print job can also be canceled by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs"></xref> class.

trans-unit.source: The page settings for the page to be printed.
Gets or sets the page settings for the page to be printed.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает или задает параметры страницы для страницы для печати.

trans-unit.source: It is possible to print each page of a document using different page settings.
trans-unit.target: Существует возможность печати на каждой странице документа, используя разные параметры.

trans-unit.source: You set page settings by modifying individual properties of the PageSettings property or by setting the property to a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>.
trans-unit.target: Параметры страницы устанавливаются путем замены индивидуальных свойств свойства PageSettings или, установив свойства на <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>

trans-unit.source: The print job can also be canceled by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
The page settings for the page to be printed.
